post:
I'm getting close to finishing my book on Ansible, [Ansible for DevOps](http://leanpub.com/ansible-for-devops/c/31WReDAfGxSZ), and one of the things that has made the book 1000x better than it would've been if I went with a traditional publishing process has been the excellent reader feedback I've gotten while writing the book.

Ansible is an excellent, simple, and approachable tool for automating all your infrastructure tasks, and works via SSH, so you can start using it with any of your LEB servers—or to automate your entire hosting infrastructure if you're a provider!

I'm publishing the book on LeanPub, which means you can purchase the book now and get every future update for free—plus there's no DRM on the book (downloadable as PDF, epub, or mobi... or all three!).

I thought I'd give a worthy LET offer and discount the book by 50% off the minimum price. You can get the book using this coupon link: http://leanpub.com/ansible-for-devops/c/31WReDAfGxSZ

Please feel free to let me know what you think about the book here, via email, via Twitter, etc. I'd love to hear what this community, especially, thinks—half my infrastructure testing is done on LEB hosts like RamNode, BlueVM, etc., so I owe a lot to this community!
